Subskills.name: The Bigger the Better

Subskills.description: Increased projectile speed for heavy ball.

Subskills.description: Swing the heavy ball around you dealing increased damage and critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Surprise Bombing
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a big bo-om on hit.

Subskills.name: Fire Frenzy
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash burning flames below the target on hit.

Subskills.name: Multi Wield
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of heavy balls.

Subskills.name: Machine Drilled Spikes
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Gladiator's Strength
Subskills.description: Increases the range of heavy ball.

Subskills.name: Terrain Collision
Subskills.description: Hitting terrain with heavy ball unleashes fiery shockwaves into all directions inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Precision and Power
Subskills.description: Increases the attack rating and damage dealt by heavy ball.

Subskills.name: Full Body Training
Subskills.description: Decreased movement diminish when using heavy ball.

Subskills.name: Critical Mass
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike chance of heavy ball.

Subskills.name: Sharpened Spikes
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple smaller heavy balls dealing a portion of the damage dealing increased damage to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Warlord Lee's Apprentice
Subskills.description: Summon multiple heavy balls permanently dragging them behind you. When casting a skill unleash the heavy balls towards the casting direction. Using this skill again will destroy the heavy balls.
